pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz or more, 64-bit
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with OpenGL 3.3 Support or better, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 170 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz or more, 64-bit
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with OpenGL 3.3 Support or better, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any OS with x11 support
  • Processor: 1.3GHz or more, 64-bit
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with OpenGL 3 Support or better, Intel HD Graphics 2000 or better
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
